title: Hearty Lentil Soup
ingredients:
1 tbsp olive oil
1 onion, diced
2 carrots, sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 cup brown lentils
4 cups vegetable broth
1 tsp smoked paprika
1 bay leaf
Salt and pepper to taste
instructions:
1. Warm olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add onion, carrots, and garlic; cook until softened.
3. Stir in lentils, broth, paprika, and bay leaf.
4. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 25 minutes.
5. Season with salt and pepper, remove bay leaf, and serve.

title: Sheet Pan Lemon Herb Chicken
ingredients:
4 bone-in chicken thighs
1 lb baby potatoes, halved
1 cup green beans
2 tbsp olive oil
1 lemon, zest and juice
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp dried oregano
1 tsp dried thyme
Salt and pepper to taste
instructions:
1. Preheat oven to 400°F and line a sheet pan with parchment.
2. Toss potatoes and green beans with half the oil, lemon juice, garlic, and herbs.
3. Arrange chicken thighs on pan and brush with remaining marinade.
4. Scatter vegetables around chicken and season with salt and pepper.
5. Roast 35 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F and skin is crisp.

title: Creamy Spinach Pesto Pasta
ingredients:
8 oz linguine
2 cups fresh spinach
1/2 cup basil leaves
1/3 cup toasted pine nuts
2 cloves garlic
1/2 cup grated Parmesan
1/2 cup heavy cream
1/4 cup olive oil
Salt and pepper to taste
instructions:
1. Cook linguine in salted water until al dente; reserve 1/2 cup pasta water.
2. Blend spinach, basil, pine nuts, garlic, Parmesan, and olive oil until smooth.
3. Return pasta to pot and stir in pesto and cream.
4. Add reserved pasta water as needed for silkiness.
5. Season with salt and pepper and serve warm.

title: Mango Coconut Chia Parfait
ingredients:
1 cup coconut milk
3 tbsp chia seeds
2 tbsp maple syrup
1 ripe mango, diced
1/4 cup toasted coconut flakes
Fresh mint for garnish
instructions:
1. Whisk coconut milk, chia seeds, and maple syrup in a bowl.
2. Refrigerate 2 hours, stirring once, until thickened.
3. Layer chia pudding with diced mango in serving glasses.
4. Top with toasted coconut flakes and mint.
5. Serve chilled.

title: Roasted Cauliflower Tacos
ingredients:
1 head cauliflower, florets
2 tbsp olive oil
1 tbsp chili powder
1 tsp cumin
1/2 tsp smoked paprika
1/2 tsp salt
8 small corn tortillas
1 cup shredded cabbage
1/2 cup pickled red onions
1/4 cup cilantro leaves
Lime wedges for serving
instructions:
1. Heat oven to 425°F and line a baking sheet with foil.
2. Toss cauliflower with olive oil and spices; roast 25 minutes until tender.
3. Warm tortillas in a dry skillet.
4. Fill tortillas with cauliflower, cabbage, pickled onions, and cilantro.
5. Serve with lime wedges.
